description: This seminar in research methods is required in the spring term for all juniors planning on writing a senior thesis in HSOC or STSC.
name: RES SEM HEALTH & SOCIETY

values.comments:
This is a seminar in research methods that is required in the spring term for all juniors planning on writing a senior thesis in HSOC or STSC.

Most found this course very challenging. Theses were heavily critiqued, but most students admitted that the all the hard work made their work much better. In the end, students agreed the course was worth their time. 

Students felt that Professor Cowan was supportive in terms of helping students formulate their theses and methods for research, but sometimes found her comments and attitude too critical as opposed to constructive. In addition, Professor Cowan was said to be very picky when it came to grading written assignments. However, students found that her attention to detail was one of the most helpful aspects of the course. She motivates students and challenges them to rise to their potential as researchers. She works students very hard so that they are prepared for their theses.

*5 respondents
